citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:40 pm, 2:55
pm on 06-Jun-18.
Knocked on the door. Called contact number provided and left message. Left business card on front door.
Departed facility at 2:05 pm. Returned to facility at 2:55 pm. Knocked on the door Business card still on front door.
Called contact number and left message.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:40 pm, 2:55
pm on 06-Jun-18.
Knocked on the door.  Called contact number provided and left message.  Left business card on front door.
Departed facility at 2:05 pm.  Returned to facility at 2:55 pm.  Knocked on the door  Business card still on front door.
Called contact number and left message.
